original: intros e entries x Hsorted Hin HeGt. induction entries as [|e' entries' IH]. - simpl. intros _. contradiction. - simpl. intros HIn. destruct HIn as [Heq|HIn]. + subst. unfold findGtIndex. destruct (x <? eIndex e); auto. + apply IH; auto.
